Package gov.nist.blockmatrixtimestamped

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nist.blockmatrixtimestamped.Block
  • public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for a block of data. Stores the data, the timestamp and the hash of these two. The data and the hash are stored as byte arrays. The class knows how to calculate hash of itself using SHA-256 algorithm.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private byte[] data
      The data stored.
      private byte[] hash
      Hash of the data and the timestamp.
      private long timestamp
      To be used for time when the block was created or modified.

    • Constructor Summary

      Create new block with given parameters.
      Block​(Block other)
      Create new block from the existing block.

      Calculate the hash of the timestamp and the data concatenated (in this order).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block​(long timestamp,
             byte[] data)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
             java.lang.NullPointerException
        Create new block with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - timestamp, a non-negative long.
        data - data to be stored, size of the array should be less than 1073741824 (1 gibibyte)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the timestamp is negative or the size of the data array is too large
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if data is null

      • Block

        public Block​(Block other)
        Create new block from the existing block. Hash and data fields are copied.
        Parameters:
        other - block to be copied

    • Method Detail

      • getTimestamp

        public long getTimestamp()
        Get timestamp.
        Returns:
        timestamp, non-negative long

      • setTimestamp

        public void setTimestamp​(long timestamp)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Set timestamp.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - timestamp, non-negative long
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the timestamp is negative

      • calculateHash

        public byte[] calculateHash()
        Calculate the hash of the timestamp and the data concatenated (in this order). SHA-256 is used.
        Returns:
        hash byte array of size 32

      • getHash

        public byte[] getHash()
        Get hash.
        Returns:
        hash, byte array of size 32

      • setHash

        public void setHash​(byte[] hash)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    java.lang.NullPointerException
        Set hash.
        Parameters:
        hash - hash, non-null byte array of size 32
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if hash is not of size 32
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if hash is null

      • getData

        public byte[] getData()
        Get data.
        Returns:
        data, byte array of size not greater than 1073741824 (1 gibibyte)

      • setData

        public void setData​(byte[] data)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    java.lang.NullPointerException
        Set data.
        Parameters:
        data - data, non-null byte array of size not greater than 1073741824 (1 gibibyte)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if data size is greater than 1073741824 (1 gibibyte)
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if data is null
